local_intent: Ensure the cloth is perceived, then move to a safe overhead pose above it and verify position.
assumptions: Cloth is reachable; visibility can be established via scan if initially not visible
coherence_with_global: Implements the perceive-then-approach portion of the global plan: performs visibility check with raster scan fallback, detects the cloth, executes MoveAbove with the same parameters as the global BT, and verifies position with IsAt.
